name: Gardeners of the Wandering Tram
description: Often found in nearby Wandererâ€™s Refuge, the Gardeners of the Wandering Tram were involved in the initial conception of the Thespin Skytram. Now operating as members of the Skywinder Cult, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
